thread.title: "Enjoyable stay, great location,very friendly and helpful staff"
thread.title_full: "Enjoyable stay, great location,very friendly and helpful staff" - Review of Hotel Montparnasse Daguerre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lesleyparker028
title: "Enjoyable stay, great location,very friendly and helpful staff"
text: I was given my visit as a surprise Birthday present by my daughter and can only say that my stay at the hotel made my trip even more special. Location is great and very good local restaurants nearby. Reception staff very friendly and helpful. Hotel itself very clean and very quiet for a good nights sleep after a day of hard walking. I can also say that we used the airport shuttle service and had no problems with being picked up and taken to the airport by a very friendly taxi driver....would highly recommend to anyone for a few days in Grande Paris
